summary: This mod will give you 3 music files to choose from to replace the main theme some when you start the game.
descriptionHtml:
All credit goes to 3 very talented ladies....
Malukah of Monterrey Mexico
Taylor of the USA
and
Lara of Australia

Check out their YouTube channels. Especially Lara. She is amazingly talented. She does tons of video game themes and even dresses in costume.

3 different files to choose from.

2 are a long and short version of the same song found here.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g

The 3rd is a conversion of this....
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cAnQQcIncq0
author: KorenoGamer
